body.name: PatioMage Ergonomic Mesh Office Chair with 3D Adjustable Armrest,High Back Desk Computer Chair Ergo3d Ergonomic Office Chair with Wheels for Home & Office Black
features: 【Ergonomic Design】PatioMage is committed to creating the most comfortable ergonomic mesh office chair. Our office chairs are perfectly designed according to the four curvatures of the human spine. With our ergonomic design based on human body curve and real needs from customers,it is easier to work in comfort by freely adjusting the headrest,lumbar support,armrest,seat depth & heigth,footrest as you need to truly make it perfect for a long office day at home!

【Adjustable Seat Depth】This office chair comes with seat depth adjust technology, an adjustable feature that can be adjusted 60mm to find the most suitable sitting position according to height and thigh length. It will effectively support the entire leg area and relieve leg pressure.

【Adjustable Lumbar Support】With split back design of lift & rotate lumbar support,your waist will be supported well.The lumbar support of this gaming chair provides a proper support by adaptive rotating 10 degrees for the natural curve of your waist.It can help to release your spinal pressure and really suitable for those who needs to sit for more than 10 hours daily.

【3D Adjustable Armrest】The arms of the branch ergonomic chair can be adjusted up and down,forward and backward, left and right to get the most comfortable sitting posture as you need.The armrests are designed with skin-friendly and PU soft materials to support your arms better.

【High-quality Materials】The desk chair is made of high-elastic special soft mesh.Highly breathable in mesh and highly durable in strength make the computer desk chair good for sitting for 10 hours or more.The footrest uses steel plate material to ensure the safety of the chairs and the comfort of the experience. With a maximum tilt of 135°, you can choose the right angle for your office hours or nap time.The base provide a strong bearing capacity max to 440lbs.

【Customer Warranty Service】PatioMage provides 1 year warranty and detailed installation guide. Our chairs are made at high standards and passed strict test before packaging to make sure every customers can get the best product and service. If you have any problems, please feel free to contact us and we will reply you within 24 hours.

Seat Depth Adjustment Seat depth can be adjusted for 2.36 inches with 5 locking position. Hyperbolic Chair Backrest Dynamic back support can fit your back curve to protect your spine. 3D Adjustable Armrest Adjustable 3D armrests allow you to set them to your ideal height and direction: up & down, forward & backward,left & right. Heavy Duty Chair Base Certified by BIFMA & TUV Rheinland, the max capacity is 440lbs.

Explosion-proof Chassis Multiple lock mechanism provides multiple recline angle positions to help maintain good ergonomic posture. Premium Gas Lift Our gas lift have passed 120,000 rotation tests and 80,000 lifting tests. Silent & Smooth Wheels It can make swivel desk chair move freely without any noise! 360° silent casters roll smoothly and effectively which can protect floors. Perfect Footrest Support Ergonomic office chair with footrest can release the pressure on the legs and enjoy the nap and work.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable with extra lumbar support!
reviews.reviewText: We needed a new office chair for our intern and looked at several before deciding on this one. We made a great selection!This office chair is a high quality piece of furniture! My husband and I easily assembled it in about 15 minutes. The parts were clearly organized. It had a very nice set of directions with it, and all the screws were very clearly labeled. The directions were concise and had instructions and nice drawings to follow. They even added in three extra screws in case one is dropped and lost.When my husband was taking it out of the box, he noticed how substantial it was- he said “I’ve had a lot of office chairs in my 30 years of owning my own business, and this one is really high-quality.” You can tell by the material that it is made from and the sturdy feeling of the base. I love the extras of the lumbar support, comfy headrest, and the foot rest. It’s honestly as comfortable as some of our reclining chairs!The armrests are nicely positioned, and the chair fits my body type well (5’ 5) and my husband’s height of 5’11.I believe we have a great new office chair for a reasonable price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Chair. Comfortable for sitting through long virtual meetings
reviews.reviewText: The PatioMage Ergonomic Mesh Office Chair is a fantastic addition to my home office. As someone who spends long hours working, I can confidently say that this chair provides exceptional comfort and support. The breathable mesh material keeps me cool even during the most intense work sessions. The ergonomic design features adjustable height, lumbar support, and armrests that allow me to customize the chair to my needs. I appreciate the attention to detail in its design, ensuring proper posture and reducing back strain. The sturdy base and smooth casters make it easy to move around and stay productive. Overall, I highly recommend the PatioMage Ergonomic Mesh Office Chair for anyone seeking a high-quality, comfortable, and stylish office chair that promotes a healthy work environment.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Unleashing Comfort for the Big and Tall
reviews.reviewText: I've been using the PatioMage Executive Ergonomic Mesh Office Chair for several weeks now, and as someone who works from home for 8-10 hours a day, I feel compelled to share how this chair has been a literal lifesaver for me. As a bigger guy at 6'2" and 300lbs, finding the right office chair that provides both comfort and support for long hours can be a real challenge. But let me tell you, the PatioMage has been a game changer.First off, the ergonomic design of this chair is something to rave about. It's like it was tailor-made for my body, aligning perfectly with the natural curves of my spine. The ability to adjust virtually every aspect of this chair – from the headrest, lumbar support, armrest, to the seat depth and height – has allowed me to find that sweet spot of comfort that I need for my long workdays.The adjustable seat depth, in particular, has been a standout feature. It's incredible how a small adjustment to fit my leg length can make such a significant difference in comfort, especially for someone of my size. The lumbar support deserves a special mention too. It has a lift and rotate feature that has provided my lower back with the kind of support I didn't even realize I was missing. It's been a huge relief for my back, especially on those longer workdays.Now, let's talk about the armrests. The 3D adjustability here is nothing short of impressive. They move up and down, forward and backward, left and right, ensuring my arms are always in the most comfortable position.And the materials! I used to get sweaty from my last office chair, but not with the high-elastic special soft mesh because it is both breathable and durable, making it perfect for sitting for long hours. The chair comes with a footrest, but I don't seem to use it much. They cut no corners with the build quality, from the moment you sit down you will feel nothing but a sturdy throne.I won't say it's been all roses, though. Getting the adjustments right took some time and patience, especially for someone of my size. Assembling this chair is a pain as it uses hex bolts, to which they provide a small tool. It would help to have a second person. This chair is also on the pricier side too, which might not fit everyone's budget, and it's a bit bulky, so make sure you have the space for it. Also, a few more color options would have been nice.But overall, if you're a bigger person looking for a high-quality, ergonomic office chair that can withstand long hours, the PatioMage is a solid choice. It's transformed my work-from-home experience, and I genuinely feel more productive and less fatigued at the end of the day. Just be ready for a bit of a learning curve with the adjustments and assembly!
